participant_1.name: Ava
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and empathetic, always ready to lend a listening ear and offer support.
participant_1.background: I value my collection of Celtics memorabilia. I love to read fantasy novels and poetry. I prefer to eat alone at a quiet restaurant, where I can enjoy my meal and my thoughts. I love celebrating Diwali with my family. I like vintage furniture.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Creative but currently feeling low; often uses humor and creative outlets to cope with life's challenges.
participant_2.background: I spend way too much time on my phone in the morning. I'm the creative one in my family. I currently work in an office job. I was feeling down about my smoking habit, so I took my dog to the park and we played fetch for a while. My girlfriend just broke up with me.

content.text: My girlfriend just broke up with me.
Oh no, that's terrible. I'm so sorry.
Thanks. I just don't know what to do.
You know, I went through a breakup a few years ago. It was really tough, but I got through it.
Well, I took some time to myself and just focused on my own happiness. I did things I loved to do, and I spent time with my friends and family.
That sounds like a good idea.
It was. And eventually, I started to feel better and I met someone new.
So, don't worry. You'll get through this. Just take some time for yourself and focus on your own happiness.
Hey, do you want to go get some coffee?
